name: Path of the Martyrs
description:
After the passing of the princess in the peaceful land of Delma, her retainer Saiyato Ichia goes to Lidoffad Lab. This lab houses many deadly foes and secrets within its walls. Will Saiyato be able to combat all the foes and revelations that come his way?

The story revolves around Saiyato and his best friend, the Princess of Delma. The further you journey through Lidoffad Lab, the more you unravel why you are playing... It will leave you speechless time and time again.

Features:

  • A classic JRPG story
  • Multiple weapons all with unique Skill Trees
  • Turn-based Battle System with Timed Special Attacks
  • Find hidden accessories and stat boosts to further customize your player
  • Multiple Endings
